Acquisition: Contracting
   
  Contracting Authority  
         
 

Flow of Authority
The flow of contracting authority travels from the President of the United States to the Contracting Officer as shown in the diagram below.

  

Contracting Officer Types and Duties
Several contract officers will likely be involved throughout any project. The main types of contracting officers and their duties are listed here:

  • Procuring (PCO) - Primary duty is to execute contracts, render decisions of fact.
  • Administrative (ACO) - Primary responsibility is to administer and modify contracts.
  • Termination (TCO) - Primary duty is to terminate contracts and resolve termination claims.
